data.text:
By Sean Carey, 29 Jun 2023

Xbox Series X|SAchievement ListSean Carey

A new entry into the iconic Double Dragon franchise comes to Xbox next month with the launch of Double Dragon Gaiden: Rise of the Dragons, and we now have the beat 'em up's achievement list.

Developed by Secret Base, Double Dragon Gaiden: Rise of the Dragons is described as a "modernized celebration" of the beat 'em up genre and features co-op gameplay that's "infused with roguelite elements to deliver classically informed, highly replayable Double Dragon-style brawls with a new edge." The new game launches on July 27 for Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One, and we can now exclusively reveal the Double Dragon Gaiden: Rise of the Dragons achievement list.

In Double Dragon Gaiden: Rise of the Dragons, it's "the years 199X," and nuclear war has destroyed New York City, leaving those who remain to fight for survival on the streets. With the city overflowing with criminal gangs terrorizing the streets, it's up to Billy and Jimmy Lee to drive them out. Double Dragon Gaiden: Rise of the Dragons also features two-player couch co-op and 13 different playable characters.

Looking at the achievement list, you'll need to unlock two different endings in the game, which suggests you may need to play through Double Dragon Gaiden: Rise of the Dragons twice. You'll also need to perform more than 600 special knockouts in a single session and Special KO 3,000 enemies in total to get the 1,000G.
